name: cidadão de bem
description: this work talks about the collective dementia of a certain part of the Brazilian population, most of which are white men over 35 years of age. We live in a dark moment in our country's politics, an authoritarian and imbecile model has taken over these people, surfing a tsunami of disinformation and armed with foul and shallow rhetoric, these people desperately need to feel part of a group, to feel that they are privileged in relation to those who refuse to enter into this unhealthy spiral of self-pity and ego masturbation. Fassimus operates in Brazil under bolsonarist rhetoric, manipulating the herd of cattle that exude phallocentrism, the idolization of population armaments and all the other infamous "traditional" values.
